content.description:
Holy Shit climbs a short, vertical face on bullet sandstone over a good landing.

Stand start with a left hand pocket and a high right hand sidepull. From there, stand up on a pair of iron nipples, bump the right hand up to a better sidepull, stick the lip, bump the left hand into an undercling next to the start hold, then match on the lip, and mantel on top.
content.protection: A pair of pads. It has a good landing. There are a few rocks, but they pad well.
content.location: It climbs the center of Dablab's north face.

content.description: Stand start with hands on the good crimps about five feet off the deck.  From there, move up the slab by hitting a left hand two finger crimp, then bump the right up through a pair of three finger crimps, hit the lip, and top it out.
content.protection: A few pads, as the immediate landing is good, but it slopes off behind it, and there are trees and rocks present nearby.
content.location:
This is on the North face of Dablab Boulder. It climbs just to the left of

Banister Villains

.

content.description: Stand start with feet pasted high, a left hand crimp, and a right hand pocket.  From there, move a big right hand up to a finger stack, bump the left up to a sidepull, then work up the slab using the large sidepull, make the left hand crimp below the lip, and top it out.
content.protection: A few pads, the landing is good but is slightly uneven.
content.location:
This ascends the blunt arete on the north face of Dablab Boulder. It climbs just to the right of

Feed Dolly Her Molly

.
